title: Rock Hill debating transportation options for Knowledge Park
text:

Many transportation options are on the table for Knowledge Park, even a street car. Post to Facebook Rock Hill debating transportation options for Knowledge Park Transportation is key to making everything work, and that's why Rock Hill leaders are meeting with the public to figure out the best way to get a economic project moving. Many transportation options are on the table for Knowledge Park, even a street car.  //www.wcnc.com/story/news/local/rock-hill/2015/10/22/rock-hill-debating-transportation-options-for-knowledge-park/74432744/   Rock Hill debating transportation options for Knowledge Park Redevelopment includes street car plan WCNC Dustin Wilson, WCNC 9:39 p.m. EDT October 22, 2015 File CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
ROCK HILL, S.C. -- Transportation is key to making everything work, and that's why Rock Hill leaders are meeting with the public to figure out the best way to get a economic project moving. Many transportation options are on the table for Knowledge Park, even a street car. 
City leaders believe Knowledge Park will be the economic hub of Rock Hill. It includes the downtown core area, City Hall, the former Bleachery property and The Cotton Factory. Thursday, city leaders met with the community to get feedback on how to make transportation smooth through the corridor. Options on the table include rubber-tired trolleys, buses, a street car and a pedestrian mall. 
"I like the connection of Winthrop students being able to connect to our downtown. Having been a Winthrop student many years ago, I think anytime we can engage the students in the community it will maybe keep them here in the future it will be good for our downtown and for others," said Rebecca Melton, of Rock Hill. 
No matter the mode of transportation the city settles on they hope to connect Winthrop University with Fountain Park. 
For more information about Knowledge Park and the transportation plans: http://knowledgeparkrockhill.com/transportation/  //www.wcnc.com/story/news/local/rock-hill/2015/10/22/rock-hill-debating-transportation-options-for-knowledge-park/74432744/ TOP VIDEOS
